name: TowerDefense (elias77)
description:
TowerDefense This Game is a simple Tower defense Game. How does it work?

With your mouse you can place monkeys on the field. You can't place they on the way. The monkeys shoot the Ballons and destroy they. The Ballons are coming form top and try to fly over the way to the  bottom. If a Ballon reach the and the game is over for every destroyed Ballon you get Money. with the Money you can buy more Monkeys. After a few times the Ballons are getting faster so place more Monkeys so that they can destroy ever Ballon before he reach the bottom.

Good Luck!
